title: Contact Us | BioLife Plasma Services
text: Your quick and easy way to get answers. Click below to start chatting! Check our most frequently asked questions for quick answers. Contact BioLife Plasma Services by filling out the form below. If you have feedback for BioLife, please fill out the form below. We will try our best to get back to you as soon as possible. Do not use this form for medical emergencies. If you have a medical emergency, please call your local BioLife center or a medical professional right away. Do not use this form to make appointments or cancellations. To make an appointment or cancel an appointment, please contact your local BioLife center. If you have questions about your BioLife debit card, like if you can get refunds, transfer funds, or use it at an ATM, please read our BioLife Debit Card FAQs. If you have any reactions to your plasma donation, you can also visit Contact us at Takeda for more information. If you have any questions related to privacy, please read our Privacy Notice for detailed information. We want to know, what inspires you to donate plasma? Whatever your reason, itâ€™s the right reason, and we want to hear it! Interested in joining the team? Please visit jobs.biolifeplasma.com to learn more. BioLife is part of Takeda.
